data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Porbandar, Gujarat, India so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Porbandar, Gujarat, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 585,400 citizens of Porbandar, Gujarat, India, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Porbandar, Gujarat, India to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the county of Porbandar
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Brahmin Tapodhan people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Brahmin Tapodhan people know you.
Lord, use Google search to lead people in Porbandar, Gujarat, India to the gospel today.
Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the county of Porbandar.
Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Porbandar, Gujarat, India.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

location.name: Porbandar
